description.action: Isaac, still in his koala form, scampers across the workshop, examining the various tools and materials with curiosity.
Evan, in his owl form, perches on a shelf, surveying the blacksmith's workshop and listening intently to the conversation.
Aurelia stands in the center of the workshop, speaking earnestly to the blacksmith and explaining the children's need for tools or weapons to help them on their mission.

The gruff but kind-hearted blacksmith listens to Aurelia's plea, stroking his beard thoughtfully. He nods and turns to his workbench, already beginning to gather materials to craft something special for the children.
